attributes.additional_details:
grounds for rejection wrong

There is no other e-petition calling for this action

Frequently more than one e-petition about one subject are allowed

other e-petititons about Gaza because has been an issue since 1948

this e-petition addresses an immediate, new, specific and vital issue and calls for immediate action

it is not a repeat

That HM government should immediately condemn Operation Pillar of Cloud which has already resulted in the deaths of many Palestinians including the assassination of a senior government leader as well as deaths of Israelis.
Should also take immediate action to prevent any escalation of violence and any armed incursion into Gaza or any repetition of Operation Cast Lead and call for an immediate ceasefire and end to the long lasting illegal siege of Gaza which has caused untold death and suffering as well.
